title: Inflation rate in Germany 1992 to 2019
summary: Overall Year-on-year change has increased over the Year.

The line drastically decreased by 8.7 times from Year '08 to '09,increased by 3.7 times from Year '09 to '10,increased by 1.9 times from Year '10 to '11,increased by 3.0 times from Year '16 to '17, and lastly, increased by 3.6 times from Year '19 to '92.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year '19 and '92.
Maximum Year-on-year change, about 5.1 was reported at Year '92
The lowest Year-on-year change, of value 0.3 was reported at Year '09
min_summary: In general Year-on-year change has rose over the Year.
